comic_aesthetic.base_style: Professional comic book panel illustration. High quality graphic novel art.
comic_aesthetic.art_style: Bold ink line art with vibrant colors. Dynamic composition with strong perspective. Sequential art style with clear visual storytelling.
comic_aesthetic.setting_tone: High fantasy medieval setting. Heroic adventure atmosphere. Rich world-building details.
comic_aesthetic.visual_quality: High detail, professional quality, publication-ready artwork. Clean lines and consistent character designs.
important_restrictions: No modern elements like phones, cars, or contemporary clothing
No real-world brand logos or text
Maintain consistent character appearances across panels

dialogue_rendering.instruction: Include speech bubbles with the dialogue text clearly readable. Position bubbles to not obscure important visual elements. Use traditional comic book speech bubble style.

panel_guidelines.action_scenes: Dynamic angles, motion lines, dramatic lighting
panel_guidelines.dialogue_scenes: Clear character expressions, appropriate body language, comfortable framing
panel_guidelines.establishing_shots: Wide perspective showing environment and context, atmospheric lighting
